column2: an A.M. Eatery////The OMG! French Toast is a brioche bread which is filled with vanilla cream and served topped with salted caramel
column4: and toasted coconut. If it sounds like the thing you grab when you have a sweet tooth
column5: it's exactly that. I'm not sure I would get this again - there are so many other options on the menu - but if your'e craving sweet sweet sweet food
